descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Derrick Rose throws a lob pass from way beyond the 3-point line to a cutting Obi Toppin who takes off to slam down a powerful two-handed dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Obi Toppin hammers home alley-oop slam) 2021/11/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Obi Toppin hammers home alley-oop slam

videos.description: Obi Toppin drives along the baseline and elevates, readjusting around a defender mid-air to throw down a sweet two-handed slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Obi Toppin readjusts for stylish throwdown) 2021/11/16 ESHEET

videos.headline: Obi Toppin readjusts for stylish throwdown

videos.description: RJ Barrett skies for big slam
